en.lotteryDecisionToolDesc: Fair decision making with dual-weighted options
en.lotteryDecisionToolLongDesc: This is a two-player lottery decision tool that allows both parties to set option weights and generate a random result. It's ideal for those with choice paralysis, team decisions, or scenarios requiring fair problem resolution.
en.bluePartyInstructions: Blue party sets the lottery title and options, then assigns weights. Generate encrypted text to send to the red party.
en.lotteryTitlePlaceholder: e.g.: What should we eat today?
en.encryptedTextHint: (Please send this text to the red party)
en.redPartyInstructions: Red party, please paste the encrypted text from the blue party, then assign weight points. Generate a random result when complete.
en.pasteEncryptedTextHere: Paste the encrypted text from the blue party here
en.weightExplanation: The random result is determined by the weights assigned by both parties. Each option's probability = (Option Weight ÷ Total Weight) × 100%
en.randomNumberExplanation: The system generated random number {number}, which fell into the interval for "{winner}", so it was selected.
en.atLeastTwoOptions: Please add at least two options
en.allOptionsMustHaveContent: Please ensure all options have content
en.distributeAllWeightPoints: You need to distribute all 10 weight points. Currently remaining: {remaining}
en.copySuccess: Copied successfully! You can now share with the red party
en.copyFailed: Copy failed, please copy the text manually
en.pasteThenImport: Please paste the encrypted text first
en.atLeastOneOption: At least one option must be kept

zh.lotteryDecisionToolDesc: 两人分别设置权重进行公平抽签决策
zh.lotteryDecisionToolLongDesc: 这是一个双人抽签决策工具，可以让两方各自设置选项权重，最终生成随机结果。适合用于选择困难症患者、团队决策或需要公平解决问题的场景。
zh.bluePartyInstructions: 蓝方设置抽签标题和选项，并分配权重。设置完成后生成加密文本发送给红方。
zh.redPartyInstructions: 红方请粘贴蓝方发来的加密文本，然后分配权重点数，完成后生成随机结果。
zh.pasteEncryptedTextHere: 在此粘贴蓝方发来的加密文本
zh.weightExplanation: 随机结果由双方共同分配的权重决定，每个选项的中选概率 = (选项权重 ÷ 总权重) × 100%
zh.randomNumberExplanation: 系统生成了随机数 {number}，落在了"{winner}"的区间内，因此被选中。
zh.allOptionsMustHaveContent: 请确保所有选项都有内容
zh.distributeAllWeightPoints: 您需要分配完所有10个权重点数，当前还剩: {remaining}
zh.copySuccess: 复制成功！现在可以分享给红方了
zh.copyFailed: 复制失败，请手动复制文本
zh.atLeastOneOption: 至少需要保留一个选项
